author: Robert Gearty
title: Ammon Bundy threatens to defy Idaho coronavirus stay-at-home order with Easter gathering
description: The rancher behind the 2014 armed occupation of a federal wildlife refuge is threatening to hold a large gathering on Easter in defiance of Idaho’s coronavirus stay at home mandate.
content:
